metadata.description:
"Take You Back" is the leading single from X&ND's upcoming debut album XANDYLAND. Dropped during the XANDYLAND: Live In Atlanta event on April 6th, the track gives collectors an exclusive first listen to the album for a select period of time before it releases on DSP's April 14th. 

Caught in a vicious cycle of love, lust, and heartbreak. "Take You Back" exhibits X&ND at his end; wanting to break free no matter who it hurts...

Written by X&ND, Noah Sammak
Produced by Nico Scali, i.amsolo
Mixed by i.amsolo

lyrics.text:
Verse 1
Any time you sent me a signal 
It was criminal 
The way you had a hold on me 
(Hard to believe) 
Didn’t cross my mind to question
Your intentions 
When you said you couldn’t love me babe
Ran away because you love the chase

Pre Chorus
I’m done trying to find a way to get back to you
Addicted to pain you put me through
Your love like novocaine 
Loving you was my mistake, I won’t do it 
Been here before but i’m no fool 
I need a breather 
Don’t know where to go
But i gotta leave you, leave you

Chorus
Find another man to love you 
If you’re waiting on my call don’t hold your breath
find another man to need you
I don’t have the time to put up with your act
Find another man to hold you 
I don’t need another damaged love like that 
Find another man to save you
I don’t have the heart to run and take you back 

Verse 2
Want me to relieve the pressure
Lay next to you
Romance through the pain
(Take you away )
I’ve moved on to the next one na
I don’t call you anymore 
And you’re going through hell
When you see me with somebody else 

Bridge
No more, I’m done
Won’t put up with your act
(If you’re waiting on my call don’t hold your breath, find another man to run and take you back)
The end for us
Not gonna run and take you back

metadata.name: Take You Back  #1
metadata.title: Take You Back
